original_text: Moses wrote about how God's Law could help people to be right with God. He said, ‘If a person obeys the rules in God's Law, then he will live by them.’
korean_text: 모세가 기록하되 율법으로 말미암는 의를 행하는 사람은 그 의로 살리라 하였거니와

sentences.original_text: Moses wrote about how God's Law
could help people to be right with God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님과 올바른 관계를 맺는 데 도움이 될 수 있다고

sentences.original_text: If a person obeys the rules in God's Law
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 사람이 하나님 율법의 규칙을 순종하면

sentences.original_text: then he will live by them
